attributes.action: GIVE POWERS TO DEAL WITH NOISE NUISANCE BACK TO THE POLICE
attributes.additional_details: THE POLICE HAVE HAD POWERS TO DEAL WITH NOISE NUISANCE REMOVED FROM THEIR JURISDICTION AND GIVEN TO LOCAL AUTHORITIES-AT LEAST SOME OF WHOM WILL NOT DEAL WITH NOISE NUISANCE COMPLAINTS UNLESS THEY ARE REPETITIVE AND MONITORED FOR 14 DAYS.THERE IS NO BODY THEREFORE WHO WILL DEAL EITHER WITH SINGLE INCIDENT COMPLAINTS NOR THOSE OCCURING BETWEEN 11pm-7am WHICH BREAK THE LAW(ANTI-SOCIAL BEHAVIOUR ACT).THE BEST PROTECTION HAS ALWAYS BEEN THE LOCAL POLICE.THE GOVERNMENT MUST ENSURE CONSISTENCY AND EQUALITY IN PROTECTION FROM NOISE NUISANCE BY GIVING THE LEGAL POWERS BACK TO THE POLICE
